content: Hello! This is the AI receptionist for XYZ home services. How can I assist you today with plumbing, electrical, or HVAC services?
Cheap loans available now! Lowest rates! Call now!
It appears you may be sending unsolicited or unrelated messages. To ensure our services are reserved for customers in need, this number will be marked accordingly. Thank you.
reason: Customer sent promotional spam messages unrelated to services
